title: Side Effects of Black in Tech (with Morgan DeBaun)
description:
This week we link with tech guru Morgan DeBaun of Blavity Inc., who downloads us on all things bitcoin and beyond.
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
For simple, smart savings on your prescriptions, check GoodRx at GoodRX.com/doses. 
Get glasses as unique as you are. One pair, infinite style. Starting at just $60. Go to paireyewear.com/DOSES for 15% off your first purchase.
Start your 100-day trial and shop the entire Away lineup of travel essentials, including their best-selling suitcases at AWAYTRAVEL.com/doses
